title: Trade your T205 James Scott for my T206 Scott
author: bnorth

posts.post_title: Trade your T205 James Scott for my T206 Scott
posts.post_content: I have BVG 2.5 Jim Scott with a Piedmont 350 back I would like to trade for a similar graded(any of the big 3) T205 Scott.
Picture of the T206 up for trade.
